configboolean.name: username
configboolean.desc: Should we use a custom hook to determine what username SpamAssassin sees (if it needs to be different from the Horde username)? If so, make sure you define _sam_hook_username() in horde/config/hooks.php. The hook will be used to set the username field that SpamAssassin uses in the preferences database. There are examples in horde/config/hooks.php.dist.
